page.title: 18AN ASIAN CHILD'S SUNDAY
page.content: My Name is Nassir Mahmood. I live at 45, Upper George Street. On Sunday I get up at 9.30 a.m. I have my breakfast at 9.45 a.m. and I get my clothes on at 10.00 and go to the Mosque at 10.10. I come back from the Mosque at 2.00 p.m. and have my dinner. When I have had my dinner I go to sleep and wake up at 3.15. At 3.30 I go to read my Prayers, again at the Mosque. When I have read the prayer then I read my Quran. At 8.15 I read another Prayer. When I have read the Prayer I go home at 8.30 p.m. and eat something and then I go back to the Mosque again to read another Prayer and I come back home at 9.30 p.m. and I go to sleep. {HECKMONDWIKE JUNIOR SCHOOL}
